channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: HUGE pothole, 28th December
item.description:
Large pothole on the ascending road that has cause two other cars in to have punctures
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Rock View Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton Hill

item.title: Very deep pothole. Approach with caution., 28th December
item.description:
This pothole has appeared since the bad weather. It is deep and hard to see at night. Beware, it will damage wheels.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Wade Court, Cheltenham

item.title: Small Flytip at Location, 28th December
item.description:
The location is on the Whittington Road just past the Burnt Oak Crossroads on the left hand side. A plastic bucket and polythene packaging have been flytipped last week. Please can it be collected.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and Flooding, 28th December
item.description:
There are massive potholes here which when it rains gets flooded and the entire side of the road nearest the wall gets flooded. It could do with a drain installing as you cannot see the potholes under the water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gloucester Road, 27th December
item.description:
Been to Cheltenham today and there are many potholes which look like been there for a while, have seen that other users of fix my street app have reported but looks like no action taking place. Could do with one of the council team to do a good inspection of road and assess to fix.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 400 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard, 27th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens

item.title: Series of very deep potholes, 27th December
item.description:
There's a series of potholes rubbing from here to under the bridge on the westbound side of the road. They are dangerously wide and deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: M5 J11 southbound slip road, 26th December

item.title: Deep pothole in road, 25th December
item.description:
Needs urgent attention, dangerous as it is deep and widening as the pothole edge on the main road crumbles. Pothole is in the turning radius exiting Coberley Road making it dangerous as pothole is struk whilst turning This week result in navy compensation claims very soon as it is certainly a wheel /suspension damaging defect
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Whittington Road, Cheltenham
